name: Restrained
description: A restrained creature's speed is 0, has disadvantage on attacks and Dexterity saves, and grants advantage on attacks against it.

effects.description: While you have the Restrained condition, you experience the following effects.
mechanicalEffects: Your Speed is 0 and can't increase
Attack rolls against you have Advantage, and your attack rolls have Disadvantage
You have Disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws
